message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.IT 

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper deals with the design of geo-distributed data centers. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is also likely as the paper discusses the impact of wide area networks on latency and survivability. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is relevant as the paper formulates an optimization problem to balance latency and survivability. 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) could be relevant as survivability is related to the security and resilience of the system. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory) could be relevant as the paper may use information theory concepts to analyze the trade-off between latency and survivability.
